Hype sticker:
Complete Performance
1991 MTV Unplugged
Including 5 never-broadcast songs [D1 to D5]

All Rights Reserved

Marketed by Rhino Entertainment Company, a Warner Music Group Company, 3400 W. Olive Ave., Burbank, CA 91505-4164

Printed in USA

All songs Published by Night Garden Music (BMI). Administered the world over by Warner Tamerlane Publishing Corp. Except B4, Published by Universal Songs of Polygram International Inc. (BMI)

Original broadcast aired by Westwood One/WNEW FM
